title: Dow Ends Day Up 76
content:
Stocks are closing modestly higher as investors parse the latest news on the job market and try to anticipate what's next for US interest rates. The Dow Jones industrial average rose 76 points, or 0.5%, to close at 16,330 today. The Standard & Poor's 500 index gained 10...... 
 
Published By: Newser - Today
